name: Monstrous Chant X
description:
Type to Reload, Click to Shoot.

Monstrous Chant X is a is a typing game, taken to the next level. You are the last of the chosen ones, the final pillar of hope for humanity. You must defeat the ones who dwell inside the dungeon, before they unleash destruction upon the outside world. But beware, the dungeon is not a very forgiving place.

This game was created for the RNDGAME JAM II, as well as it being the first game I've ever made. Any feedback is greatly appreciated.

Last updated on 28/07/202
